events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible. The product I got is not what I ordered.
The customer's issue has been categorized under 'Refund' based on their request for money back due to receiving the wrong item.
The case was assigned to agent Sarah T. for further assistance with the refund request.
Hello! I’m Sarah from customer support. I’m sorry to hear about the mix-up with your order. I’m here to help you get a refund quickly.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can process your refund more efficiently?
Sure, my order number is 987654321 and I have attached the picture showing the incorrect item received instead of the headphones I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate your refund immediately and send you a prepaid return label to send the wrong item back at no cost.
Thank you for the prompt response and the refund process. I appreciate the quick help and will send the product back today.
Your refund has been processed successfully and you should see the amount credited to your account within 3-5 business days. Thank you for your patience.
We wanted to check in to ensure that you have received your refund and that everything is now satisfactory with your order experience.
Since your refund was completed and confirmed, we are closing this case. Please contact us anytime if you need further assistance.
We have sent you a brief satisfaction survey about your recent refund experience. Your feedback helps us improve our service.
